greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between n-th lucky number and n-th prime number.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
mathematica: lst = Range[1, 428, 2]; i = 2; While[ i <= (len = Length@lst) && (k = lst[[i]]) <= len, lst = Drop[lst, {k, len, k}]; i++ ]; lst - Prime@ Range@ Length@lst (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, May 15 1998
ext: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 12 2006
